title: "Researchers Warn: Risks of Using AI To Grow Our Food Are Substantial and Must Not Be Ignored"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) is on the cusp of driving an agricultural revolution, and helping confront the challenge of feeding our growing global population in a sustainable way. But researchers warn that using new AI technologies at scale holds huge risks that are not being considered."
